name: 林律吟
schedule:
Week 1 Rules
Week 2 Ch. 1 Mole Balances
Week 3 Ch. 2 Conversion and Reactor Sizing
Week 4 Ch. 2 Conversion and Reactor Sizing and quiz
Week 5 Ch. 2 Conversion and Reactor Sizing 
Week 6 First mid-term 
Week 7 Ch. 3 Rate Laws and Stoichiometry
Week 8 Ch. 3 Rate Laws and Stoichiometry
Week 9 Ch. 10 Catalysis and Catalytic Reactions and quiz
Week 10 Ch. 10 Catalysis and Catalytic Reactions
Week 11 Ch. 10 Catalysis and Catalytic Reactions
Week 12 Second mid-term 
Week 13 Ch. 10 Catalysis and Catalytic Reactions
Week 14 Ch. 6 Multiple Reactions 
Week 15 Ch. 6 Multiple Reactions and quiz
Week 16 Ch. 6 Multiple Reactions 
Week 17 final term
scorePolicy:
1. Absence/presence 5% 
2. Quiz 20% 
3. Mid-terms and final term 25% each
materials:
Elements of Chemical Reaction Engineering
(4th Edition by H. SCOTT FOGLER)
課程對應SDGs指標: 無（None）SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG2：消除飢餓（Zero Hunger）SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG5：性別平等（Gender Equality）SDG6：潔淨水與衛生（Clean Water and Sanitation）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）SDG14：水下生命（Life below Water）SDG15：陸域生命（Life on Land）SDG16：和平正義與有力的制度（Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
